Men's Hat Size Conversion Chart

Find the perfect fit for your head with our hat size conversion chart. This guide helps you convert between inches, centimeters, and standard hat sizes, ensuring a comfortable and stylish fit for any headwear.

Inches Centimeters Hat Size
21 1/8 53.7 6 3/4
21 1/2 54.6 6 7/8
21 7/8 55.6 7
22 1/4 56.5 7 1/8
22 5/8 57.5 7 1/4
23 58.4 7 3/8
23 1/2 59.7 7 1/2

How to Measure Your Head for a Hat

  1. Use a flexible tape measure or a string.
  2. Measure around your head about 1/8 inch above your ear, across the mid-forehead, completely circling your head.
  3. If using a string, mark where the end meets and then measure the length with a ruler.
  4. Record the measurement and use the chart above to find your hat size.

Note: If you're between sizes, it's usually best to choose the larger size for a more comfortable fit.
